Articles.Content:
Out of interest, could someone please confirm which version of KSP the demo is running on, I did think it was like 0.18 or something but having looked through the dev notes it seems as if they have science/contracty new stuff.

Thanks,

-Sam
The demo is a modified 1.0 now.

> 
> The demo is a modified 1.0 now.

Oohh, i might try it for fun XD

Thanks, my friends playing it and it looks like it an old version, hence my confusion. Has it received an update recently?

-Sam
